column1: When everyone in you family has a a little cold you're not quite sure how the corona-virus has spread

WaPo reports a 2nd California person w/ no travel history or connections to known cases has #COVID19. Indicates community transmission. https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2020/02/28/coronavirus-live-updates/

If I recall correctly from covering SARS, it took a few weeks to obtain genome of that coronavirus. Advances in sequencing now make it a quicker endeavor. Genome is helpful but pub health measures are only way to stop spread. https://twitter.com/trvrb/status/1220820373261832193 …
